name: kenmyo-application-server
description: application server for kenmyo project, responsible for authentication through cognito and forwarding request to related services

scripts.start: npm run build && KENMYO_ENV=TEST:LOCAL_INTEGRATE sam local start-api
scripts.build: tslint -p ./tsconfig.json --fix && tsc && bash -c "cp package.json dist " && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && bash -c "scripts/deploy"
